title: Diary of a chambermaid = Le Journal d'une femme de chambre
creator_credit: Luis Bunuel, Michael Sabra, Serge Silberman, DEAR Film, Filmsonor, Cine Alliance and Speva
brief_description: Celestine (Jeanne Moreau) takes up a post as chambermaid to a middle-class family and becomes the catalyst that reveals their sexual, religious and social repressions. The film, foot fetishism and all, is pure Bunuel, a sharp social satire in which the sexy, cruel and cool Moreau is wonderful. Loosely based on the novel by Octave Mirbeau.
